quote-source: Tom Chatfield, Cats, Memes and Internet Schemes
quote-text: If this sounds grandiose, it is worth pausing to consider the netâs unique credentials when it comes to mixing banality and brilliance. In internet terms, memes are quite literally better than sex, let alone politics: more popular, more universal, and more widely accepted. We are living in a digital world that attaches deep value to the capacity to share, and to laugh together at almost anything.
